column4: I use mouse numpad emulation under X. At gdm, it is fast, but not in gnome. Why?
I use mouse numpad emulation under X. At gdm, it is fast, but not in gnome. Why?
I use mouse numpad emulation under X. At gdm, it is fast, but not in gnome. Why?
WM hasn't loaded yet in gdm?
yea. The gnome window manager doesn't load until you log into gnome. Thats the only thing I can think of.
Its probably a setting in accessability.
What is shift + numlock, the mousekeys?
yea, speed is probably a gnome setting
